name: Maryrose Coleman
title: Co-Founder
bio: As a serial entrepreneur, Maryrose's extensive background includes working as one of the first women on the trading floor of the Toronto Stock Exchange, and subsequently as an investment advisor with Merrill Lynch. An avid art collector with a keen eye for interior design, Maryrose has designed and built luxury residences in some of Torontoâ€™s most exclusive neighborhoods, including Moore Park & Lawrence Park. More recently, Maryrose took over the helm of the luxury cottage rental company Muskoka District Rentals in Port Carling.

name: Ross Halloran
title: Founder
bio: Ross Halloran brings a wealth of business experience to the luxury rentals industry. An executive-level business development and marketing professional, Ross has over 30 years experience helping Fortune 500 Canadian, U.S. and International clients execute successful sales, advertising, marketing & loyalty programs. Ross applies a proven, needs-based, analytical approach to customer service. For vacation property owners in Muskoka and other popular lake districts in Central Ontario, Ross maximizes property values by safely generating rental income for his clients while applying best practices to help mitigate other costs of ownership.
